name: Press Shift to Drift
description:
Welcome to Press Shift to Drift! This is a simple little 2D racing game.

Use the arrow keys to accelerate forwards and back, and turn left and right.

And of course — Press Shift to Drift!

(and space to honk)

This is my very first complete release. I know it's just a small little thing and a bit buggy at times, but I learned a lot about Unity and game development in the process! So I'm very proud of it. The project took about about 5 months of on and off work to complete.

All programming, art, and music were done by me.

Have fun!
